```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(ggplot2)
```


```{r cars}
summary(cars)
```


```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
n <- 10000
mu <- 0
sigma <- 1
x <- rnorm(n, mu, sigma)
df = data.frame(vary = x)
ggplot(df, aes(x=vary)) + geom_histogram(color="black", fill="white")
```


```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
n <- 10000
min_y <- -1
max_y <- 1
y <- runif(n, min_y, max_y)
df = data.frame(vary = y)
ggplot(df, aes(x=vary)) + geom_histogram(color="black", fill="white")
```
